name: Spellfield
description:
Farm! Fish! Sail! Do magic! Fall in love? You can do all this and more in Spellfield, the fantasy RPG. Fulfill the Ancient Prophecy, if you dare...

Farm!

Cultivate your land - clear the earth, plant seeds, water them, and harvest!

Fish!

Find rare fish and improve your skills!

Sail!

Navigate the high seas around Spellfield and sail to distant lands!

Do Magic!

Become a master of magic - use powerful staffs, cloaks, and rings!

Fall in Love?

Befriend the townsfolk and find romance!


Features List:
-Explore a richly detailed world
-Befriend the townsfolk
-Learn seven skills: Farming, Forestry, Mining, Fishing, Combat, Stealth and Magic!
-Have cute pets and take care of them
-Plumb the depths of vast dungeons
-Create useful machines and cook food
-Play many Mini-games and solve puzzles
-Use magic equipment to offer special bonuses
-Learn lore and secrets from in-game books
-Witness the changing seasons and dynamic world
-Attend the town festivals through the year
-Over an hour of OST!
-Collect various items to unlock sweet bonuses around town
-Uncover the many secrets of Spellfield...
